title: Move DotNetBuild properties into the repo
body:
This minimizes the differences between a DotNetBuild and repo build. This will eventually allow to converge the entry point paths.

commit.message:
Move DotNetBuild properties into the repo

This minimizes the differences between a DotNetBuild and repo build. This will eventually allow to remove the differnet entry point paths.

nodes.body: @dotnet/kitten can yuo please approve and merge? This helps with a VMR effort: https://github.com/dotnet/dotnet/pull/176
